select SEQ_CS.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO CS(CS_NUMBER, CS_TITLE, CS_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER) VALUES (#{csNumber}, #{csTitle}, #{csContent}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT CS_NUMBER, CS_CONTENT, CS_TITLE, CS_DATE, C.USER_NUMBER, C.CS_READ_CNT, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.USER_BELONG FROM CS C JOIN WW_USER U ON C.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER WHERE C.CS_NUMBER = #{csNumber}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CS_COMMENT WHERE CS_COMMENT.CS_NUMBER = C.CS_NUMBER) AS COMMENT_CNT, CS_NUMBER, CS_CONTENT, CS_TITLE, CS_DATE, C.USER_NUMBER, C.CS_READ_CNT, U.USER_ID FROM CS C JOIN WW_USER U ON C.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY C.CS_NUMBER DESC

SELECT wu.USER_NUMBER , wu.USER_NAME , wu.USER_POSITION , g.GRADE_NAME , up.PFP_UPLOAD_PATH , up.PFP_SYSTEM_NAME , up.PFP_UUID FROM WW_USER wu LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_PFP up ON wu.USER_NUMBER = up.USER_NUMBER left outer JOIN GRADE g ON wu.USER_GRADE = g.GRADE_NUMBER WHERE wu.USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber}
